title: Can't get past Launcher
body: I can get to the league launcher with ease but when I click launch it just makes the sound without switching to the league client. I have tried reinstalling, re patching and a multitude of other 'solutions' (including running as administrator). When I transfer other people's league to my computer it works fine until the next patch when the problem reoccurs. I am also on windows 10 but the problem occurred on windows 8 as well. Help would be appreciated. Thanks!

replies.body: im so sick of deleting the air client every time i want to play league. YAY. another 3 hour download. hopefully people can actually do something about this. this problem has been happening for months and nothing has been done
